Twin Disciplines.name: Twin Disciplines
descriptions: Your Holy damage spells have a $33822h% chance to reduce the mana cost of your next Shadow damage spell by $33832s1% and your Shadow damage spells have a $33827h% chance to reduce the mana cost of your next Holy damage spell by $33833s1%.

Your Holy damage spells have a $33823h% chance to reduce the mana cost of your next Shadow damage spell by $33832s1% and your Shadow damage spells have a $33828h% chance to reduce the mana cost of your next Holy damage spell by $33833s1%.

Your Holy damage spells have a $33824h% chance to reduce the mana cost of your next Shadow damage spell by $33832s1% and your Shadow damage spells have a $33829h% chance to reduce the mana cost of your next Holy damage spell by $33833s1%.

Focused Casting.name: Focused Casting
descriptions: While active, you no longer lose casting time from taking damage and you are immune to Silence and Interrupt mechanics.  Lasts dIndex=7.

Meditation.name: Meditation
descriptions: Allows 7% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 14% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

Inner Focus.name: Inner Focus
descriptions: When activated, reduces the Mana cost of your next spell by 100% and increases its critical effect chance by 100% if it is capable of a critical effect.

Improved Power Word: Fortitude.name: Improved Power Word: Fortitude
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost and increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 15%. In addition, reduces the chance listed spells will be dispelled by 45%.
Reduces the Mana cost and increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 30%. In addition, reduces the chance listed spells will be dispelled by 90%.

Martyrdom.name: Martyrdom
descriptions: After being struck by a critical hit, you become immune to critical strikes for next $14743n $lattack:attacks; or $14743d.
After being struck by a critical hit, you become immune to critical strikes for next $27828n $lattack:attacks; or $27828d.

Concentration.name: Concentration
descriptions: Gives you a 4% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any damage spell.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by $33807s1%.
Gives you a 7% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any damage spell.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by $33807s1%.
Gives you a 10% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any damage spell.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by $33807s1%.

Improved Inner Fire.name: Improved Inner Fire
descriptions: Increases the Armor bonus and number of charges of your Inner Fire spell by 10%.
Increases the Armor bonus and number of charges of your Inner Fire spell by 20%.
Increases the Armor bonus and number of charges of your Inner Fire spell by 30%.

Pilgrimage.name: Pilgrimage
descriptions: Increases movement and mounted movement speed by 5%.  This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.
Increases movement and mounted movement speed by 10%.  This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

Wand Specialization.name: Wand Specialization
descriptions: Increases your damage with Wands by 25%.
Increases your damage with Wands by 50%.

Unbreakable Will.name: Unbreakable Will
descriptions: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 5%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 10%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 15%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 20%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 25%.

Silent Resolve.name: Silent Resolve
descriptions: Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 10%.
Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 20%.
Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 30%.

Improved Memory.name: Improved Memory
descriptions: Increases your casting speed by 5%.
Increases your casting speed by 10%.
Increases your casting speed by 15%.
Increases your casting speed by 20%.
Increases your casting speed by 25%.

Power Word: Requital.name: Power Word: Requital
descriptions: Blasts an enemy with Light, instantly causing $/2;s1 Holy damage, 347 if the target is feared, stunned or incapacitated.

Force of Will.name: Force of Will
descriptions: Increases your spell damage by 2% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 1%.
Increases your spell damage by 4% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 2%.
Increases your spell damage by 6% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 3%.
Increases your spell damage by 8% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 4%.
Increases your spell damage by 10% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 5%.

Improved Power Word: Shield.name: Improved Power Word: Shield
descriptions: Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by 10% and reduces the duration of the Weakened Soul effect caused by your Power Word: Shield by 2 sec.
Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by 20% and reduces the duration of the Weakened Soul effect caused by your Power Word: Shield by 4 sec.
Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by 30% and reduces the duration of the Weakened Soul effect caused by your Power Word: Shield by 6 sec.

Mental Strength.name: Mental Strength
descriptions: Increases your total Intellect by 3%.
Increases your total Intellect by 6%.
Increases your total Intellect by 9%.
Increases your total Intellect by 12%.
Increases your total Intellect by 15%.

Mental Agility.name: Mental Agility
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of all your spells by 5%.
Reduces the Mana cost of all your spells by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of all your spells by 15%.

Stratagem.name: Stratagem
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Mind Control and Mana Burn spells by 0.5 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Mind Control and Mana Burn spells by 1 sec.

Power Infusion.name: Power Infusion
descriptions: Infuses the target with power, increasing their spell damage and healing by 15%.  Lasts dIndex=2.
